notes.node_version: Node 22.16.0 is newer than recommended. Node 20.x LTS is the sweet spot for Expo SDK 54.
notes.expo_sdk: SDK 54 is the latest stable. Uses React 19.1.0 and RN 0.81.4 as confirmed by official template.
notes.react_version: React 19.1.0 is officially supported by Expo SDK 54.
notes.react_native: RN 0.81.4 is the version paired with SDK 54. TurboModule issues may be config-related.
notes.auth_libs: All auth libraries pinned to exact versions for reproducibility.
notes.dependency_strategy: Pin exact versions to avoid future compatibility issues.
